record.title: MEASURES PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 2633, S. 2634, S. 2636
record.narrative:
MEASURES PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 2633, S. 2634, S. 2636 -- (Senate - February 14, 2008)

[Page: S993]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, there are three bills at the desk due for their second reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bills by title for the second time.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (S. 2633) to provide for the safe redeployment of United States troops from Iraq.
A bill (S. 2634) to require a report setting forth the global strategy of the United States to combat and defeat al Qaeda and its affiliates.
A bill (S. 2636) to provide needed housing reform.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I object to any further proceedings with respect to these bills, and I object en bloc.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bills will be placed on the calendar.
